text: Nasser Farbod (; 27 April 1922http://www.jebhemelli.info/%D8%A8%D9%87-%D9%85%D9%86%D8%A7%D8%B3%D8%A8%D8%AA-%D8%AF%D8%B1%DA%AF%D8%B0%D8%B4%D8%AA-%D8%AA%DB%8C%D9%85%D8%B3%D8%A7%D8%B1-%D8%B3%D8%B1%D9%84%D8%B4%DA%AF%D8%B1-%D9%86%D8%A7%D8%B5%D8%B1-%D9%81%D8%B1/ â€“ 26 April 2019) was an Iranian political activist and military officer. He served as the Chief-of-Staff of the Islamic Republic of Iran Army from 27 March 1979 until his resignation on 12 July 1979. He was born in Tehran. Farbod died on 26 April 2019, at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Iranian military people Category:Politicians from Tehran
title: Nasser Farbod
